entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 a.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 6:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount possibly more than 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4 except zero in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4 except zero in low lying areas. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
